briefTitle: Behavioral and Pharmacologic Treatment of Binge Eating and Obesity: Maintenance Therapy

outcomeMeasures.title: Binge Eating Frequency (Continuous)
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating will be assessed by interview and self-report and the primary outcome is frequency. Frequency will be defined continuously (analyzed dimensionally).

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Body Mass Index
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI is calculated using measured height and weight. We report percent change in weight from baseline. Negative values indicate weight loss.

outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating will be assessed by interview and self-report and the primary outcome is frequency. Frequency will be defined continuously (analyzed dimensionally).

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Body Mass Index (BMI)
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI is calculated using measured height and weight. We report percent change in BMI from baseline. Negative values indicate weight loss.
